eventName: Where Vernal Winds Will Never Blow
storyInfo: Liang Xun, Wei Yenwu, the Grand Tutor, and Ling gather at Yumen in anticipation of Chongyue leaving office. Lee and Waai Fu have also come, following Huai Tianpei's trail. Lin Yühsia finds the body of the Catastrophe Messenger and escorts it out of the city.

attributes.text: It's one thing to make me play Go with you because you're bored, dear brother, it's another to use the pieces to form the character for 'bored.'
I can see you haven't practiced the Go theory I taught you.
As if that would help me against you.
It's true that the character on the board doesn't look as nice as your handwriting.
Why don't you find something else to pass the time, if it's not really a Go game that you're after? Go hiking, learn an instrument... I could teach you calligraphy, if it comes down to that.
The Go match may have been devoid of interest, but there's meaning in reading my opponent's thoughts from the movement of the pieces.
Oh? What thoughts did you read this time?

attributes.content: Hey, lou sai, what gives? This show skipped from episode seventeen to episode twenty!
attributes.name: Lungmen Tourist

attributes.content: Happens with a scratched disc. Must've been the sand. Just deal with it, it's not that bad.
attributes.name: Innkeeper

attributes.content: It was a key moment! Qi Qingqiu and Shen Feibai were at each other's throats a moment before, then suddenly they're fighting side-by-side? How'd we get there?
attributes.name: Lungmen Tourist

attributes.content: Qi Qingqiu finds out Shen Feibai killed his shifu, and sets out to kill him in turn.
attributes.name: Drinking Old Man

attributes.content: When he arrives at Yumen, however, he finds Shen Feibai a high-ranking officer in the military.
attributes.name: Drinking Old Man

attributes.content: With invaders at the gates, Qi Qingqiu suffers a sleepless night and realizes that there is more at stake than personal vengeance, so he joins the Grandmaster's banner to face the foe.
attributes.name: Drinking Old Man

attributes.content: It's a simple story, but the duel by the cliffs was a classic!
attributes.name: Drinking Old Man

attributes.content: Wodetian, how many times did you watch that?!
attributes.name: Lungmen Tourist

attributes.content: Any child in town could recite the plot of Heroes of Yumen. Backwards.
attributes.name: Innkeeper

attributes.content: There's just one detail that this gentleman left out. Qi Qingqiu didn't set his grudge aside when he first saw Shen Feibai in the army.
attributes.name: Innkeeper

attributes.content: It was the Grandmaster who pledged to face Qi Qingqiu's sword on behalf of Shen Feibai, leading to the duel by the cliffs.
attributes.name: Innkeeper

attributes.content: Clouds darkened the skies and the winds bellowed, as though heaven and earth were witness to the showdown. The two drew their swords—
attributes.name: Innkeeper

attributes.content: (In awkward Yanese) Nonsense! Nonsense!
attributes.name: Tourist in Sargon Garb

attributes.content: Fight look good, but details no, no good!
attributes.name: Tourist in Sargon Garb

attributes.content: You again, He Xi'an. Do you even know enough Yanese to understand the story?
attributes.name: Innkeeper

attributes.content: Of course! Heroes of Yumen tell true story fifty year ago. Many hero join together, even though disagreement, still fight together against enemy under Grandmaster.
attributes.name: Tourist in Sargon Garb

attributes.content: I know many scenes shoot in these inn!
attributes.name: Tourist in Sargon Garb

attributes.content: 'Were shot', 'this inn'.
attributes.name: Innkeeper

attributes.content: Looks like you know a thing or two about Yanese history.
attributes.name: Lungmen Tourist

attributes.content: Of course. Grandmaster tell me when teach me fighting, in Sargon.
attributes.name: Tourist in Sargon Garb

attributes.content: Grandmaster has sword, but sword special, cannot pull out.
attributes.name: Tourist in Sargon Garb

attributes.content: This again. How could you lose to that Feline girl so easily if you're really the Grandmaster's pupil?
attributes.name: Innkeeper

attributes.content: What about Feline girl? She very strong. Why you look down her?
attributes.name: Tourist in Sargon Garb

attributes.content: He's not looking down on her. He's looking down on...
attributes.name: Lungmen Tourist

attributes.content: Hahaha...
attributes.name: Crowd

attributes.content: So if the TV show was adapted from a true story, was there really a time in Yumen when kung fu adventurers joined forces with the army against a common foe?
attributes.name: Lungmen Tourist

attributes.content: To enjoy the freedom of being one's own master, but also achieve great things fighting for one's country... it's pretty cool.
attributes.name: Lungmen Tourist

attributes.content: Well, it's a TV show. The only people who know how things really went down historically are the ones who were there.
attributes.name: Drinking Old Man

attributes.content: Anyway, swords and spears are out of fashion. If you really want to do something for your country, you should learn Arts and become a Tianshi.
attributes.name: Drinking Old Man

attributes.content: How would a fortress like Yumen operate, without civilians working to supply its resources?
attributes.name: Drinking Old Man

attributes.content: The people who came here to this cold and remote place when the city was first built, and the people who still stay here—they're fighting for their country, in their own way.
attributes.name: Drinking Old Man

attributes.content: The only thing in the TV show that we know is real for sure, the Grandmaster, is leaving too.
attributes.name: Drinking Old Man

attributes.content: Out of the way.
The medicine you ordered.
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: Thanks. Just put it over there; I'll have someone take it to the back.
attributes.name: Innkeeper

attributes.content: I've got the creams for bruising and burns, but we didn't have enough supplies to make herbal meals.
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: Here's the money. Send my regards to the doc. Oh, and we just had our supplies delivered. Take some back to the clinic.
attributes.name: Innkeeper

attributes.content: There's a lot of stuff. One second, I'll get someone to help.
attributes.name: Innkeeper

attributes.content: No need.
attributes.name: Burly Man

attributes.content: He carried the whole cart on his shoulders?!
attributes.name: Innkeeper

attributes.content: How did the clinic find someone so strong?
attributes.name: Innkeeper

attributes.content: Good morning, sir.
attributes.name: Innkeeper

attributes.content: I've been here a few days, but I've never seen this place empty.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: We just linked up to resupply with Lungmen a few days ago, only to run into a Catastrophe that forced an emergency separation.
attributes.name: Innkeeper

attributes.content: Lots of merchants and tourists were stranded in Yumen, filling up the inns.
attributes.name: Innkeeper

attributes.content: Business is good, but it also means more trouble, especially when people who are already frustrated start arguing.
attributes.name: Innkeeper

attributes.content: There are many who would love to have your problem.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Although come to think of it, my head would probably start to hurt if my little business back in Lungmen started getting so busy.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Would you care to start the day with some tea?
attributes.name: Innkeeper

attributes.content: Sure. What about the thing I asked you to look into?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Here, the Yumen Arena Board of Fame records from the past six months. Not much I can do if the martial artist you're looking for isn't on it.
attributes.name: Innkeeper

attributes.content: So Yumen operates an arena to this day... such a martial tradition is impressive.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: The Lord Exorcist trains his troops well, and there's no need for folks like us to fight on the battlefield these days. Still, the martial artists need somewhere to hone their kung fu, hence the arena.
attributes.name: Innkeeper

attributes.content: Anyway, I would suggest you stay a few days, if it's not urgent. With so many people passing through, someone may have seen the one you're looking for.
attributes.name: Innkeeper

attributes.content: You could also ask at the South Side Sword Forge.
attributes.name: Innkeeper

attributes.content: The shifu there knows the city inside and out. Plus, lots of kung fu fighters hanging around.
attributes.name: Innkeeper

attributes.content: Thank you... it's always tough when you don't know the lay of the land.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Mind if I ask what this is about? Are you looking for a friend? An enemy? A debt to repay? Or a debt to collect?
attributes.name: Innkeeper

attributes.content: I guess you could say this particular individual owes me a pretty big debt...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: How long will you be this time?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: No idea.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Will you ever come back?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: When it's all done.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: Do you know that Waai Fu's birthday is in three days?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I wasn't a good husband, and I can't be a good father.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: It's enough that I achieve one thing in life.
attributes.name: Huai Tianpei

attributes.content: A debt to collect, eh? That's gonna be tough. Yan is a big country, and more than a hundred thousand souls live in Yumen alone. Not easy to find someone who doesn't want to be found.
attributes.name: Innkeeper

attributes.content: Anyway, your tea's ready. Would you like a side of Yumen-style sauteed meat to go with it?
attributes.name: Innkeeper

attributes.content: Sure, I'll take a seat and wait for my girl to finish her match.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Lungmen Spring Tea. Just came in. We only get fresh leaves like these once every few years.
attributes.name: Innkeeper

attributes.content: Appreciate it. Feels like a waste to use them on me.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Don't say that. We always value our guests.
attributes.name: Innkeeper

attributes.content: Hm... Spring Tea from Lungmen shouldn't have a bitter taste this time of the year...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: ...It's you?
attributes.name: Aloof Woman

attributes.content: We weren't supposed to meet here.
attributes.name: Aloof Woman

attributes.content: Er... excuse me?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: No... you're not...
attributes.name: Aloof Woman

attributes.content: Do you two know each other? Would you care to share a table, since we're pretty full today?
attributes.name: Innkeeper

attributes.content: No, we don't. I'm not staying long, just a cup of tea.
attributes.name: Aloof Woman

attributes.content: It's fine, it's fine.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Very well, then. Let me know if you need anything.
attributes.name: Innkeeper

attributes.content: Did you mistake me for someone else?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: You just looked familiar.
attributes.name: Aloof Woman

attributes.content: Must have been an old friend that you haven't seen for ages.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I suppose... stick to your tea.
attributes.name: Aloof Woman

attributes.content: Have one on me.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: You're buying me a cup of tea, even though we don't know each other?
attributes.name: Aloof Woman

attributes.content: All meetings are the work of fate, even the ones that start with a misunderstanding.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Here's to finding old friends soon.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: It'll happen when it happens. No point trying to force it.
attributes.name: Aloof Woman

attributes.content: That's an interesting answer. The answer lies not in the ones we're looking for, but in the journey of looking for them.
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Do you talk so much to everyone?
attributes.name: Aloof Woman

attributes.content: Ah, I apologize...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Are you leaving?
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: I said I wasn't going to stay long.
attributes.name: Aloof Woman

attributes.content: How strange...
attributes.name: Lee

attributes.content: Are you sure you don't want to speak to the general first? It's been a while since the last time you came back.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Father is a busy man. I should not bother him at work.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Perhaps I'm being too much of a busybody, but the Department of Discipline and Supervision found your actions faultless in the Shangshu matter. You should not feel guilty about facing the general.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: I don't.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: There's nothing for me to do at home anyway. I thought I might as well take a look around town. The Grand Tutor must have sent me to Yumen expecting something to happen. I should keep my eyes open.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I'll come with you, if it's official business.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: It's been years since the last time you were here, hasn't it, Uncle Taihe? It must bring back memories.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Things have changed a lot.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: It's impressive that the general has been able to keep the people of Yumen safe and thriving, with constant warfare going on in the north.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: The arena remains as popular as ever.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: You still rank fifth on the Board of Fame.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Fame is fleeting. I would be glad to see some young talent knock me off the board.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: The girls in the ring right now...
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Did something catch your attention?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I was just thinking how your kung fu would compare to theirs.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Ahem...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: The Grand Tutor says that a Candleholder's duty is to carry the fire that drives out the shadows of the Feranmut, and to travel amongst to people to learn their troubles.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: A sense of duty comes first, shrewdness second. Kung fu comes third or fourth at best.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Indeed.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: So... How do I compare, then?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: To be frank, while few are as swift as you, in a head-to-head fight, I would say your chances are thirty-seventy, in the other side's favor.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: The pair have already traded a dozen moves.
There is hardly time to catch one's breath.
The Feline girl advances, launching a flurry of fists that keeps her opponent's weapon hand in check.
She kicks out. Her opponent, a girl in exotic garb, goes along with it, leaping back with the kick.
Hold!
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: You're out of the ring.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: It's true that you couldn't make full use of your ranged weapons in the ring.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: But rules are rules. It's my win.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: You're very good. And I've never seen anything like your style of fighting.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: (In awkward Yanese) Lose this, no more fights?
attributes.name: Exotically Dressed Girl

attributes.content: A martial artist shouldn't be too obsessed with victory and defeat, but I can't lose here.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: You want the sword too?
attributes.name: Exotically Dressed Girl

attributes.content: Sword? What sword?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: People in the city say, number one on the Board of Fame can get the special sword.
attributes.name: Exotically Dressed Girl

attributes.content: No... I just wanted to climb the rankings so my name can be seen.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: You number 31. Means 30 people stronger than you?
attributes.name: Exotically Dressed Girl

attributes.content: ...I suppose so.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: You are better than me.
attributes.name: Exotically Dressed Girl

attributes.content: (I guess this won't work...)
attributes.name: Exotically Dressed Girl

attributes.content: Hey, where are you going?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: If I win this, I make it to the first page of the Board of Fame.
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: But will he see it?
attributes.name: Waai Fu

attributes.content: Round 15. The Millenion was hit in the right wrist, right pectoral, central abdomen and throat. Qiubai was not hit. Qiubai is the winner.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: Haha, I would have died three times, if this were a real battle.
attributes.name: Millenion

attributes.content: Real battles are about the mind as much as kung fu. Who knows how things would have turned out?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: You are indeed the Grandmaster's student. It was humbling.
attributes.name: Millenion

attributes.content: ...Thank you.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: I would like to see the Grandmaster's comments.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: The recent ones are all here. The Grandmaster has been paying close attention to your bouts, despite his busy schedule, and he has high praise in particular for your swordsmanship.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: Something on your mind?
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: I was just thinking what he meant by 'not enough purity in the sword.'
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: And how long would it take for me to reach the point where I can beat him.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: There is no mention of it in the Grandmaster's Book of Kung Fu. I don't think he said it to anyone but you.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: As for beating the Grandmaster... I'm not sure how many in the entire world have even dreamt of such a thing.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: You think I'm crazy?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: My job is simply to follow the Grandmaster and record the martial arts of the world truthfully.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: There are many more people than usual at the training grounds today. Why isn't he here?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: General Zuo has visitors. The Grandmaster is also meeting an old acquaintance in the keep.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: I'll be going, then.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: Man zou. It was an honor.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: Why do you always treat me like I'm your senior, even though you've been following the Grandmaster for much longer?
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: The Grandmaster says that one who keeps records must be acutely aware of the strengths of others.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: You are stronger and wiser than I am. I have much to learn from you.
attributes.name: Record Keeper

attributes.content: If you say so.
attributes.name: Qiubai

attributes.content: The general nocks an arrow, drawing the thick bow so full that it looks like the full moon.
The hand on the bow trembles slightly, and the arrow wobbles with it. The general's brow furrows deeper with each wobble.
The arrow pierces the target, half an inch away from the bullseye.
Good shot, sir.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: No need to flatter. I know my own body.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: I could still swing the sword and spear a couple of years ago, but now I can hardly hold a bow properly.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Even if there's no need for me to stand on the battlefield myself, it's not proper to have a sick man leading the Yumen garrison... my time is short.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: All the court knows that your injuries bear witness to decades of service in defense of Yumen.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: I'm not concerned about my health or life, but I have some unfinished business.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: The Grand Tutor has instructed me to assist you. I will help you manage Yumen's return.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Did the Grand Tutor say 'assist?'
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: I'm sure you understand his intentions...
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: I haven't thanked you for your help in Shangshu yet. I apologize for the trouble that Zuo Le caused. He's still young and inexperienced.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: You exaggerate, sir.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: You must understand what a father feels.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Zuo Le has done well, but he is in a position that does not permit any mistake, no matter how small.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Lord Zuo is young and bright, a rising star. It's not unusual for young people to be a little impetuous. I would not worry too much about it.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: What about me, Liang? Am I impetuous to you?
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: ...I believe you have your reasons, sir.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Word of your benevolent administration in Shangshu has reached even Yumen, Liang, but have you ever seen a battle with your own eyes?
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: There were pirates on the Shangshu River a few years ago... but nothing compared to the battles that you have seen.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Then you understand that making decisions as a general in the field is different from managing at a desk.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: The battlefield is ever-changing, and thousands of lives hinge on your every decision.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Which do you think is more important then: decisiveness, or caution?
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: The bestial Sui matter is pressing. We must act.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: I am much illuminated.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: In your position as Yumen Advisor, you are on the battlefield, and we are comrades. I hope you understand my way.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: I trust you, sir. I'll give my all.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: However, the Feranmut problem is neither administrative nor military.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: I trust your decisiveness, but I also ask that you trust my caution.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Right...
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Another arrow, this one striking the bullseye square.
Would you care to try, Liang?
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Your reputation is that of a scholar-warrior, equally at home with sword and bow as with pen and paper.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: The Yumen bow is heavy, though. Do you feel up to it?
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Chief Executive Wei Yenwu of Lungmen is here, sir. He's waiting in the meeting hall.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: Very well.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Mr. Lin's daughter was a few days early. It was about time for Lord Wei to arrive.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: The Grand Tutor has arrived as well.
attributes.name: Patrol Battalion Soldier

attributes.content: Did the Grand Tutor and Lord Wei travel together?
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: I expect Lord Wei is here on private matters.
attributes.name: Liang Xun

attributes.content: Official or private, there are still two honored guests at the same table.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: Looks like you're not the only one here to give me counsel today, Liang.
attributes.name: Zuo Xuanliao

attributes.content: My dear elder brother.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: I had a dream last night.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: I dreamed I heard the wind rushing by at midnight. I opened the window to find the desert had become a sea of sprouting trees, some of them even in full bloom.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: The branches of the trees grew and formed a web, trapping Yumen within.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: 'Few are those who truly break away from home.'
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Do you still miss Yumen?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: What was the saying you had when you left Yumen last time? I forgot.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: 'Neath crisp night merriment resounds; travelers doubt 'its truly frontier-bound.'
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: A new one. It's been a while; looks like your thoughts have changed.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: A century is not too long, but I came back at this point in the dream.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: To me, a hundred years is simply thirty thousand days and nights, the urgent reports, the scouts departing, the Messengers returning.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: The watch has changed innumerable times since you left, and countless new bricks and stones set into this wall.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: But still it stands.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Did you see Nian and Dusk in Shangshu?
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Yea. They haven't changed one bit. They've found a place to stay, a place where they can have fun.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: And so, you met our second brother.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: We lesser siblings always worry our eldest brother, don't we?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Dusk is a sensitive and thoughtful little sister, but she keeps it to herself and tells no one, which is why she's often troubled.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Nian looks carefree on the surface, but she fears loneliness more than any of us. She constantly needs something new to keep her mind occupied.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: I don't have much to worry about you, other than maybe you getting too drunk and forgetting to pay your tab.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: But as the oldest sister, and without any official responsibilities, it would be good if you spent more time with your younger siblings.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: Do you accuse me of being an irresponsible big sister?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: How many families are like ours? From whom do I learn? I have to figure things out on my own.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: But our foolish sisters just don't know how to rise above things. They keep making it hard for themselves.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Don't blame them for being self-troubled. Put yourself in their shoes, and you may not find it easy to free yourself from troubles.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: I'm not as free as you are. After all, you've managed to completely cut your 'Self' off, and find an entirely new 'Self'.
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: The name 'Shuo' and the sliver of soul are sealed within the sword. Now I'm just an ordinary man who knows a little kung fu.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: 'A little?' How many martial artists would abandon their careers if they heard you just now?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: Taking into account the fact that I've had centuries of practice, perhaps I should call myself less than ordinary.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: The sand sluice there churns through tons of sand every second, clearing a path for Yumen's advance.
The massive nomadic city rolls toward its new goal at high speed.
Where are you planning to go after you leave Yumen?
attributes.name: Ling

attributes.content: I'll go south to see the bridges and streams, have some of the heartland brew, or see the place where Nian and Dusk are staying.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: The jianghu world is big. There are plenty of places to go.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: But I suppose all the people with whom I've shared a toast are gone now.
attributes.name: Chongyue

attributes.content: In the distance, the heat rising from the ocean of sands warps heaven and earth.
The wind is weak by the time it reaches the tower. The sand in the wind touches the cheeks, almost like a caress.
Three thousand miles of yellow sand, in the blink of an eye.
Checked the serial numbers on the gear. It's the Catastrophe Messenger's group, which should have been back this morning.
attributes.name: Yumen Sentry A

attributes.content: Traces of Originium explosives. The bodies have probably crystalized and turned to dust...
attributes.name: Yumen Sentry A

attributes.content: Watch out for Originium residue.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: This is less than two hours from the city. Who would attack a Catastrophe Messenger on official business so close to a nomadic city?
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Everything valuable has been taken. It would make sense if this was the work of bandits.
attributes.name: Yumen Sentry A

attributes.content: Or someone who wants to make it look like the work of bandits.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Keep looking. We need to find the Catastrophe survey data.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia

attributes.content: Found it!
attributes.name: Yumen Sentry B

attributes.content: It was a little further away, under a piece of broken armor.
attributes.name: Yumen Sentry B

attributes.content: They protected it with their lives.
attributes.name: Yumen Sentry B

attributes.content: There's no time. Get it back to the city, but keep your eyes open.
attributes.name: Lin Yühsia
